website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a sleek and stylish desk lamp should check out this contemporary option.
pros: Flicker-free light for easy reading and eye-care
5 color lighting options alongside 7 brightness levels
Bulb saves 75% more energy than traditional desk lamp bulbs
cons: Has a tendency to tip over if adjusted too far
Difficult to see on-off switch in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Good for artists
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for about a week or two now. It's super nice when I'm drawing or filming videos because I can switch the brightness or the different lighting colors. Its light, sturdy enough for what I need to do. I dont leave it on overnight though.
customer_reviews.author: JayM

customer_reviews.title: Great deal very cool
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cool and pretty bright for the money , so I’d say it’s a definite hit with me!!!
customer_reviews.author: “TheDirtyDipper” ClaytonDavidHowellSonnier

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Easy = this lamp. I am NOT a fan of "blue/white" light. This lamp offers a range of color tone, and the yellow is exactly what I was after. From dim to bright, the controls are simple to use and work as advertised. Consider me a fan of this brand at this point.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great lights.
customer_reviews.text: Great light. Incredibly bright, but also has so many levels of adjustment. Of course if you lean it too far to one side it’ll tip so just don’t do that.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Newman

customer_reviews.title: Emits extremely dangerous level of RF radiation.
customer_reviews.text: Why the massive radiation? Is this some kind of an effort to kill people? Someone should take this apart and look for a frequency generator and antenna deliberately placed in there. Its located somewhere near the led area. Had to throw it out. Sickened that we used it for some time till i measured things around the house that are emitting harmful radio energy and this thing was way more powerful than anything in the house. Its many times higher than the microwave energy level.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Incardona

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. Compact and does not take up a lot of space on my desk. Seven levels of brightness for great easy adjustability. The color temperature ranges from very cool white to very warm - the coolest white is like a fluorescent lamp and the warmest light is like an incandescent, which is my preference. The last desk lamp I had was LED and flickered - it was subtle, but very distracting and annoying. This does not flicker. Very easy on the eyes. AC cord/plug included.
customer_reviews.author: JR Bay Ridge

customer_reviews.title: adjustable goose-neck LED desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking at various goose-neck LED desklamps so snapped this one up in the Black Friday sale. I love it! I can point it directly at the book or art project and can adjust the amount of light as needed. It's MUCH easier on my eyes than my old florescent desk lamp! Really pleased with this one, and I recommend it. One tip: turning the lamp off was slightly tricky, and not well documented. You need to press and hold the power icon side of the touch screen.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND! Elegant Desk and Sound Recording Studio Lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Great, Elegant Desk and sound recording Studio Lamp. What was most important for me - it has the white light and yellow light, so you can choose in between, whatever suits your eyes and environment. It is definitely Eye-Friendly, has a nice dimmer, with 5 lighting Modes and 7 brightness Levels... not gonna fatigue your eyes. Has a flexible Gooseneck and is really Great for work, reading. etc. Solid construction and beautiful. Thank you TaoTronics. Awesome product. I'm gonna buy another one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bibi K.

customer_reviews.title: Subtle high-pitch ringing noise
customer_reviews.text: For those with good hearing, you will find a subtle high pitch ring coming from the light. When trying to concentrate on an activity like reading it’s incredibly distracting and annoying. Since this was the sole purpose for which I purchased the lamp, it’s effectively useless. Don’t buy this as a reading lamp.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect as a study lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp as a desk lamp for my 4 year old daughter. A standing lamp was an overkill for her desk, so I did my research and this lamp looked just right. Its light output is just perfect. She does not usually even need to adjust it, as it turns on by default at mid level. There are not moving switches, so lesser things to hopefully go bad. The light dimmer is a touch sensitive type of a surface. The finish and quality looks good so far, but it has only been a few days so far. I would have liked a slightly thinner base, but no complaints.I am hoping this lamp would lats long!.
customer_reviews.author: Saurabh Kumar

customer_reviews.title: USED TWICE THEN FAILED AFTER THE 30 DAY AMAZON RETURNS POLICY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased August 15,2018 and used once for 1 hour, came back from a long vacation and used for about 20 mins. Then the unexpected happened, it shut off by itself and would not turn back on. Plugged it into another outlet and still didn't work. Waited a few hours and tried switching it on again.....still didn't work. Not happy with the quality of this light. Now Amazon returns policy is for 30 days which means I must keep this not-working piece of junk . Amazon please come to my rescue and replace this item! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: brewster

customer_reviews.title: MUCH MORE THAN I EXPECTED IT TO BE -- FIVE STARS!
customer_reviews.text: This is much more than I expected it to be! It's a very sleek and beautiful lamp, well-covered to protect the finish and well-packed inside the manufacturer's box. And... it comes with a user manual. It started instantly, and just as advertised -- the light is easy to adjust. This is a non-flickering light (thank you!) and perfect for using for coloring with professional artist pencils (my hobby!). I almost didn't select this one after reading comments about it tipping over easily. The base is heavy enough to keep it from tipping in any direction, so I don't understand what circumstances would have warranted those comments. Thank you for a lovely product, which I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Fritch

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito?
customer_reviews.text: It's adequately bright, but it emits a non-stop, high-pitched whine when turned on that drove me crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Moppet

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: There is no weight at the bottom so it falls over at the slightest touch or rotation. Too top heavy. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: JO

customer_reviews.title: meh . . .
customer_reviews.text: Pros: very nice range of brightness, flexible goose-neck arm matte black finish fits in easily with most home office decor perfect size for my application Cons: very light weight (one flick of my cat's tail and the lamp was on the floor), off' button is a bit tricky (a tiny, tiny 'active' area to turn it off) lamp 'head' gets hot quickly, even on lowest setting stiff lower 'arm' limits flexibility and positions 'dim' is simply 'not as bright.' Fixes: paperweight on lamp base to keep it steady pen kept handy to turn it off dark surface under lamp to lessen brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: Base doesn't have any grip or weight, so you can't actually adjust the neck more than 2 degrees one way or the other, and it takes two (or three) hands to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Joe

customer_reviews.title: Has a mind of its own.
customer_reviews.text: For the first few weeks, the lamp was great. Then one morning, it started dimming on its own. I'd set it for maximum brightness, and about 10 minutes later the light would dim, brighten, dim, brighten and so on. No idea why this is happening! I unplugged it, and then plugged it back in after waiting, but it is still happening.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen P. Arrants

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light, Well Packaged, Great for Art
customer_reviews.text: I previously ordered a light very similar to this one which arrived in working condition but scratched because it wasn't packaged by the manufacturer very well. So when I needed another desk lamp I bought this one instead. It arrived very well packaged by the manufacturer with no scratches. It works perfectly. The different shades of light are great for doing art projects and also computer work. I do think the other light that I purchased was a bit brighter than this particular one but it works fine for my purposes. I recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Denver's Mom

customer_reviews.title: I needed a good night reading lamp, and this one's perfect
customer_reviews.text: The design is a little "techy", but it still looks sleek enough, especially on my small nightstand. The dimming and light temperature features are amazing, but beware that if you're a person that can have absolutely no light present while falling asleep, THE POWER ON/OFF BUTTON DOES GLOW, thus casting a light upwards. You can fix this by putting something on top of it (remember that it's a sensor). I'm definitely happy with the quality and how much it has improved the comfort of my life.
customer_reviews.author: xayc

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really, really like this little lamp. From the picture, I thought it would be bigger, but I actually like the smaller size. It fits perfectly in the space I have for it. I did not want a lamp that had to be recharged or had to plug into a USB port, this lamp plugs into the wall and I don't have to worry about making sure it is charged for my next use. I also like having the option of different levels oft brightness - from bright to dim. It came quickly and well boxed. I highly recommend and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Lamp is unstable on the table--it tips easily and won't stand at all in some positions.
customer_reviews.text: The light level and color is acceptable, but the lamp tips over with only an ounce or two of "touch" on the lamp itself. In some positions, it won't stand up at all. Why? The base is too light &/or small. The lamp-head is too heavy. This flaw has been noted in several reviews, but I didn't read them. It seems that the design is "form over function." Goose-neck desk lamps have been around for about 100 years--users don't expect it to tip over in a stiff breeze or slight touch. This could fall on a child or otherwise damage something. NOT RECOMMENDED (returned).
customer_reviews.author: Quality Manager Guy

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASED TO REPLACE A SIMILAR ITEM - I would totally recommend this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement lamp of a different brand but, it is working extremely well. The controller to make it brighter or darker is easier to find in the dark. I have mine on the top of the headboard as there is a shelf in-between so it can't fit any closer. I haven't found a really good lamp that is short enough to fit in that space without worrying about a fire hazard. This one is a little better than my last one also due to the shape of the head where the light comes out. I can twist it while bending the part of the stand that bends and keep it totally off of my husband's face.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene A.

customer_reviews.title: Small, but Mighty Desk Addition
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my husbands home office desk. It takes up very little surface space, and it’s not visually obvious in the desk. The flexible arm easily moves in every direction And stays in position. Easy to position so you can avoid that unwanted glare in your eyes. I thought the multiple light tones and brightness was just going to be overkill, until he started using it for both; clear, bright task lighting, as well as softer lighting directed at his face for his video conference meetings. It’s lightweight, but doesn’t knock/fall over. We are quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Gr8OKcooks

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality light; but could be a little brighter
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice quality product. There is a good range of color temperatures; you are likely to find one that you like. The design is sleek, and the controls are easy to use. I wish it were a couple of inches taller; I have it up on top of a small cardboard box to get it up to the height that is right for me. My biggest complaint about this product (and it's not a big complaint) is the maximum brightness level is just adequate for me. I wish there were at least one level brighter. I don't know what anyone would use the lower levels for ... a nightlight maybe?
customer_reviews.author: MacMike

customer_reviews.title: Has every feature you could want, and all laid out is such a cool and easy way
customer_reviews.text: This is the best desk lamp. It's bright, and if it's too bright there is a very cool track of blue lights where you can slide it to any brightness. Also a touch button where you can change the color temperature. It's VERY nice. The on off touch button turns it on to the last setting i.e. brightness/color temperature. It is so cool, I bought another one for my room mates room. He likes it very much, as I think would anyone. Ten thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Indi Rock

customer_reviews.title: Lamp is cheap piece of garbage. Seller is trying to buy good reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Lamp is really top heavy. I had to put a paper weight on the base because it’s so cheap and light-weight. It’s a cheap piece of garbage. UPDATE: I downgraded this from 3 stars to 1 star because the company is constantly badgering me to remove my review, including offering to pay to have me remove it. I’ve been emailed at least half a dozen times by them. DO NOT BUY THIS OR ANY PRODUCT FROM THIS SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: This is the light I kept after returning another.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice desk lamp. It's lightweight but well built. The light temperature selection is a very easy touch until you find your favorite of 5 options. The blue LED-lit power button is easy to find in the dark. And the brightness is a super easy glide across the smooth surface to your desired brightness. But the reason I returned the last lamp, among a few other reasons, was because it's gooseneck was very loose. This lamps gooseneck is very easy to move into any position and sturdy so it stays exactly where you want it. Not a little lower because it can't hold. That's why I kept this guy. The other stuff is just bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Dry Town

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Lamps are awesome, and this one is no exception. The lighting covers the white, and has 4 gradual settings into a warmer orange color. It does not lose brightness when switching to warmer phases, and the lamp can be also be dimmed considerably. The base is well balanced, which leaves a lot of room for neck adjustments. The touch sensitivity isn't perfect, and sometimes requires multiple attempts to trigger a reaction, which makes the brightness slider somewhat difficult to adjust. It does remember the brightness and warmness settings, so I'm not bothered by the lack of sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Kirschman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I like the touch controls (on/off, dimming, and modes). The five modes are light temperature variations - from bluish white to a yellowish warm. It is a very nice looking lamp. Intended to use it with a smart plug, but the lamp won't turn back on with a voice command (the on/off button must be touched to turn the lamp back on). Not a deal-breaker for me (I just used the smart plug with another lamp). I haven't had the lamp very long so I can't speak about its longevity, but I'm very happy with the lamp so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mike KTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Nice modern look
customer_reviews.text: I like the versatility of this lamp but unfortunately it stopped working after a couple days. However, the seller was prompt and responsive to offer a replacement. I had bought this before and didn’t have issues with it. Overall, the lamp looks great and modern. If you have any issues with the performance, I would reach out to seller directly. If my review has helped you in any way, please click the "helpful" button below so that I know! If you have any questions feel free to ask! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Versatile & Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: The longer I have this lamp, the more I love it. Purchased for when I "do" my nails---but that's only every 2-3 weeks. In the mean time, I now have it in the bathroom, where I keep my little dog during the day. I stretch up the gooseneck so the light shines in the mirror, reflecting the light all over. I love this feature the most-----when I go into that bathroom when its dark, I just place my hand over the base & it turns on-----you don't have to press an exact spot or fumble in the dark. It's the little things in life, isn't it!
customer_reviews.author: annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Let There Be Light!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a halogen desk lamp but the switch got old and I was unable to repair it. This little (literally) beauty has provided me with a new approach to a desk lamp. The neck is adjustable, up to about 12 inches high. The intensity of the light and the light's color shade is adjustable as well. My only complaint is that the base could be a bit heavier. It's not that the lamp will fall, it's that I am somewhat clumsy in the dark and often knock into it when I go to turn it on. Now let's see how long this lamp will last!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Good range of brightness
customer_reviews.text: I like this TaoTronics LED desk lamp. I use it next to my sewing machine so I can see better when I'm working. It's really bright and great for that. In the evening, I set it to warm light since I'm very sensitive to light (too cool or bright and I can't go to sleep later). I haven't noticed any problems in my sleep schedule, so the warm light on the dim setting seems fine. The touch buttons are resposive with no lag, and the lamp doesn't feel hot ever. Overall, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Charger does not work.
customer_reviews.text: This is not charging my phone at all. The phone is 1 week old and there’s no case on it that could block a connection. The charger just doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Elan

customer_reviews.title: Ironically stopped working right after return period
customer_reviews.text: Product initially was nice.... then noticed weird buzzing noise coming from base and then light started flickering until a constant flicker. Now completely useless. And of course one month return period over. Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.author: Delmo

customer_reviews.title: Nice little lamp...
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very compact while still being bright enough to light up a bedroom. I use it as a lamp for my electronics table where I charge everything and it works great. I can turn it on a dim setting and change the color temperature so it's not so bright or, like I stated above, I can light up my whole room by turning up the brightness and adjusting the neck. That is also the reason I purchased this one instead of some of the others, the neck is flexible so you can move it to any position you want. I would definitely recommend this lamp for any purpose you see fit being that it's small.
customer_reviews.author: Brotha Dave

customer_reviews.title: A small investment  a with a huge benefit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase from TaoTronics, and like the first purchased several years back does not disappoint. It is a small lamp but provides a variety of light choices. You can also choose between a bright white or a soft yellow light depending on your requirements. It is nice looking as well, sleek, in simple black with a versatile, bendable arm. I have one in each of two rooms and plan on ordering a third for my reading chair in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Bovary

customer_reviews.title: Was good, for 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoyed this lamp... for 3 months. Now it won’t turn on at all. And of course my return window is closed. So much for the one year warranty. UPDATE: the seller contacted me and offered to refund the price of the lamp. The company went the extra mile to satisfy.
customer_reviews.author: jmOH

customer_reviews.title: A Great Lamp - Does More Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp. I am a teacher and ordered it for school so I could have some discreet light at my desk while students watch videos. It is very flexible, as I had hoped it would be, and offers several different light settings. It's important to know that these do much more than make the lamp brighter or dimmer - the settings actually affect the kind and tone of light being used. The color and 'temperature' of the light actually changes, making for very pleasing, yet subtle differences in illumination. The lamp is easy to use and set up and I can report (unfortunately!) that it seems to be very durable. Would happily repurchase or recommend. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp for a desktop!
customer_reviews.text: Great desk lamp. Weighted so it doesn't tip over. Color temperature of light can be changed. Intensity of light is variable. Flex gooseneck allows lamp to be positioned. Both intensity and on/off switch easy to access.
customer_reviews.author: Art Zeigler

customer_reviews.title: Hi tech desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent replacement for my PC desk. Really glad I purchased it. The old desk lamp had to go. It was hot, and had a flimsy switch on top. (because of heat build up). I saw this one that others loved and have not looked back. It has a setting for any light needed. Very bright LED's that now stay cool which is what I wanted. Takes up a lot less space too! Comes very well packaged and delivered promptly. The price couldn't be beat. Thanks Amazon seller.
customer_reviews.author: Old Tech

customer_reviews.title: suitable for studying, reading books at quiet night
customer_reviews.text: I like this table lamp by its flexible gooseneck. Using this gooseneck, you can not only adjust the height of the light resource but the direction of the light. The design of 7 levels of brightness and 5 modes of colors are also nice. Although I use the warm white color most, I like the weak yellow mode when its time for a coffee break. Also, the USE port design is my favorite. It seems that I do not need my charger since I have this lamb on my studying table. In a word, this is one of my joyful shopping on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: suki

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bright Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I just Love this lamp. It is versatile and bright. The gooseneck makes easy to direct the light anywhere you need it. As others have mentioned, there is a small issue regarding the lamp tipping. A little extra care when moving it, should not be a problem. The touch on/off is So easy and nice. Overall a really Great lamp. Thanks. Update, I still love this lamp a lot. One small idea though. In changing the different colors of the light, could the manufacturers make as kind in dial or slide switch to know what color is on? It is difficult to tell by just looking at the light by itself. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Chifan7

customer_reviews.title: not very bright but great great CS
customer_reviews.text: Update: got contacted by the customer service and they sent me an updated model which is much brighter at the highest. Top notch customer service and gangrened customer satisfaction so buy with confidence. good compact lamp with adjustable brightness, although I have been using only the highest level of brightness since bought. the only complain about this lamp is it is not very bright even at the highest. for a desk writing and reading lamp this seems to be not enough.
customer_reviews.author: cailiqingsheng

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend to use as a desk lamp for studying. Upgraded from a short halogen floor lamp. This was clearly a step up and it is extremely easy and intuitive to use. Not super harsh but plenty bright enough even while the blinds are up and daylight is shining in the room. Also survived a couple drops.
customer_reviews.author: WesleyTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Loved it and then...
customer_reviews.text: This was a such a cool little lamp. Worked beautifully on my nightstand until I noticed the top of the lamp (plastic) was becoming deformed. The area on top of the lamp had become so hot that the plastic began to warp! I have no idea why this happened, but I immediately unplugged it and removed it from the bedroom. Such a bummer considering the really nice feature set of color temp and intensity.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeShowing

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: The range of color temperatures for this light is pretty broad, from "romantic" warm to "noon daylight" cool. I personally prefer light in the 4000k range, and I use it at the second-to-coolest setting. Brightness range is decent. This is not the brightest light: the 27w fluorescent it replaced seems twice as bright. I wouldn't want to try to use the light to cover more than about 4 feet or so of space. And its control pad area is largely flat, which makes operating it without looking *very* difficult. That's the problem with any touch panel, not just this one. For the price, I feel I'm getting at least what I should be able to expect.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY MASSEY

customer_reviews.title: Love this little lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in my at home “classroom” during the remote learning period of COVID. My office space was limited to a small room with a tiny window that provides almost no light. This lamp provides a wide variety of brightness and warmth choices to tailor to your individual preference. It’s also super flexible and able to be angled in any direction you choose. It’s lightweight but sturdy at the same time. I honestly can’t believe how great this lamp is for the price! If you need a desk lamp, just buy it!!!
customer_reviews.author: redsoxnation

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small, cheap desk lamp and went with this one. The look and operation are top notch. Slick, simple controls, elegant simplicity, and ample light for my desk at night. The color temps are a cool feature, even though I only use the warm setting. It remembers the last setting when you turn it on each time and it looks cool. The only con is that it's not bright enough to fill a room much if you need that. But for $21.99, it's a great value. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Various light settings and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hour days and I'm one of those folks that likes less strain from light as the day goes by. My keyboard is not lit and I was searching for one that also allowed a govt chip card reader. Some had lit keyboard no reader and vice versa. I decided on this beautiful light with 7 different light settings. A huge relief for my eyes. Now all I have to make sure is my husband doesn't take it when I'm deployed.
customer_reviews.author: MC 💙

customer_reviews.title: Great versatile desk top lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I like just about everything about this desk lamp. I like the small footprint, the AC adapter, the different temperatures of light as well as the different levels of brightness. I like the flexibility of the gooseneck and even the USB port. The price was very good as well. So far the lamp has worked well. I am currently using it as an overhead light source for my microscope and for photographing gems and jewelry. I also use it as a task light when on my laptop. 💜
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now own 4 of these and I love them!
customer_reviews.text: They're simple to set up and easy to operate. They have several color options such as daylight, white light, etc. They have a USB plug in them so I can charge my phone without needing another outlet. The goosenecks are easy to adjust and hold their place well. I started out with two, and I just received my next two. I use them for crafting, but they would work for pretty much anything. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Devine

customer_reviews.title: Good Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp for reading at my desk and it works perfectly. It offers several levels of brightness and hue of color. I keep my lamp on "warm" for my office. It remembers the brightness and hue you had it at last when you turn it on, which is nice. The only complaint I have about this lamp is that the light portion is heavy and the base does not support it when you move the head to the left or right too far. It will tip over. I ended up putting weights on the base to help support it. Since then, it has work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: JonoVonOno

customer_reviews.title: More than just a desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a flexible little desk light that can also be used as a light source for video conferencing. It's a very simple solution that works perfectly. Brightness controls are easy accessible at the base and you can also adjust the color temperature. You want a cooler color when you're drawing but a warmer color when you use it for video conferencing. It even has a USB port on the back! Hope it will last a long time. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Big lamp in a little package
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific little desk lamp. I ordered it quickly as a temporary light for doing jigsaw puzzles when my fancy expensive light died. This lamp is lightweight yet sturdy and provides plenty of light to a specific area. The light itself is easy on your eyes and it's a nice looking lamp as well. I'll be buying a few more for several other areas of my home where I need a designated light source. The folks at this company are also extremely nice to work with and ship quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Denise W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my small Betta tank. The LED light is white and perfect to illuminate him. The little lights that come on these small tanks are so awful and this was a perfect solution. It has several settings from low to high without buttons but sensory touch--very cool. The neck is really flexible and I was able to make it sit above the tank just right. This would be great for a desk as well. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: W.C.

customer_reviews.title: Review on 2016 model.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last year before the new and improved model with the warmer color temps available. I assume others had the same complaint, so it's good to see a company respond and improve their products. The only other thing I didn't like is probably nit-picking but having to 'long press' to turn off. I know, it's only a couple of seconds but I like instant on/off. 3 stars from me is not a negative, it just means "It's okay." Now that the lighting includes the lower end of the spectrum, I would recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Alice WakefieldTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Multiple Lighting Options Are Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent desk lamp with multiple lighting options. The neck of the light can be moved in many positions depending on your task. Nice size to fit in small area. I would buy this lamp again. Had a cheaper name brand before this one and it died in less than one year. I’m hoping the LED lights in this model will last longer as I hate throwing away the whole fixture. That’s the only downfall to LED lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Chiller99

customer_reviews.title: ... for a small fish tank and it is working great. The dimmest setting gives the tank a nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as lighting for a small fish tank and it is working great. The dimmest setting gives the tank a nice, moody feel, while the brightest setting is enough light for my live plants. My only criticism is that when the light first turns on, it turns on at the lowest setting--not a problem in most situations, but it means i can't put this light on a timer because the lowest setting isn't enough light for my plants. This is a big enough inconvenience that i probably wouldn't buy it again as a fish tank light, but I also realize this isn't what it was designed for.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hart

customer_reviews.title: Nice light - but top-heavy, tips over
customer_reviews.text: The brightness and color temperature control are great on this light. The neck is flexible up to a point, allowing for adjustment. However, the base is so light that any adjustments beyond a normal frontal position make the lamp tip over. Desklamp Design 101 teaches us that lamps should have a heavy base so they don't flop onto their faces. Also, a the touch-control button is very slick, but I would prefer an old-school switch you can feel in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Jubal Howe

customer_reviews.title: A great desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my computer desk mainly because I had purchased a similar one, a clip on, as a piano lamp for my daughter. It not only looks great but the lighting options make it a winner. From bright white to daylight and just a touch to turn on and off. It's a lot brighter and more versatile than those green shade desk lamps with the pull chain plus it looks really great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Doty

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Eyes!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is fabulous, easy to use, great features especially as I have eye trouble, and it is easy to adjust the color and the brightness for whatever my needs are. The weak link was that the instructions were so tiny I could not read them--had a friend over and we played around to figure out how to work it. Button on left: on/off. Button on right: change the color. To change the brightness, run your hand along the strip of blue lights, it will go up or down accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Cici

customer_reviews.title: I like this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Mostly, I like this lamp. I use it on my night stand. It is easy to switch on and off and adjust the brightness. I don't know why it requires a "wall wart", that is, an AC adapter at the plug. It is annoying because it interferes with adjacent outlets. Also I wish the dimmest setting was dimmer - about half what it is now. Sometimes when I wake up at night I like just a little bit of light and the lowest setting on this lamp is still too jarring. If those two little items were improved, I would rate this lamp 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: M. Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Bright, awesome work light!
customer_reviews.text: This is the main light that sits on my electronics workbench. It is one of the best lights I ever owned. You can bend the neck how you like and it features about 5 or 6 different color settings. I tend to always have mine on the white LED setting because it seems to have the best visibility for what I do. You can also turn up or down the brightness with the slide of your finger on the touch pad. Incredible product that I may have to get an extra!
customer_reviews.author: Derek K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my kid to use for virtual classes. The touch sensitive buttons are very responsive. The light output is fairly distributed in all directions which is good. USB output as described is good enough for charging a phone. But take a while to charge an iPad (as expected). My only gripe is that the wall plug is not just a wire. It is a decently big wall unit and will take some space.
customer_reviews.author: GSR

customer_reviews.title: A good light but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Coming from an old hot halogen desk lamp, I really like this light. The varying brightness is super useful and the adjustable color temperature gives even more flexibility, depending if I'm working at night, during the day, taking photos, etc. The downsides: The base is too light. The lamp is top-heavy and easy to knock over. Also, I find the low-voltage power supply with barrel connector annoying. Why not use a 120V cord, put the power supply in the base for weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Debby Boone
customer_reviews.text: In the words of Debby, "you light up my life." Before I bought this lamp I was living a dark and meaningless life, full of gloom and without meaning. But now I can see, both literally and metaphorically. With this device I can not only adjust the level of meaning in my life but also the color temperature. If you lack light in your life, buy this plastic thing that's likely from China. You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: L.D

customer_reviews.title: easy to place and use anywhere for supplemental light
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is lightweight and easy to place anywhere (near an outlet), and the lamp head can be turned in any direction. Color temp is adjustable from cool to warm. At 7 watts it costs almost nothing to leave it on for soft room illumination. The light is bright enough to use for reading next to a sofa or chair. The touch controls work instantly and noiselessly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Fiero

customer_reviews.title: Too dim for reading, hard to control, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This is an adequate accent lamp, but I find it too dim as a desktop or bedside reading lamp. Controls are easy to activate accidentally and hard to operate by feel--you have to be looking right at it to be sure you're touching the right spot (unlike a physical button). Base is very lightweight, so it's easy to knock over or dislodge. Still, it works just as advertised and has had no functional problems in the three years I've owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Olin Sibert

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, but the base is too light, unfortunately, limiting the swing of the light head.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, well-made light. Works great, but the base is a little too light, so you can’t really move the light head 360-degrees. More like a 90-degree sweep with the light head over the long end of the base or it will fall over. The lights great, works well and feels like a quality product, but the engineer that designed the base shouldn’t get a bonus this year.
customer_reviews.author: Chris VH

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp, fits on the corner of my desk perfectly. Takes up very little space. Love you can change the brightness. The only weird thing is I will have it off and then all of a sudden it will come on. Has happened just a few times, no big deal I just touch it to shut it off. Just a bit different. Has not happened the last two days. I will still order two more for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: D. Price

customer_reviews.title: A lot of power for such a small light
customer_reviews.text: This thing puts out a lot of light, although you can adjust it how you like, including "white" and "soft" settings. It's a perfect bedside table lamp. The only drawback is that the base is so light, the lamp is a little top -heavy, which makes it easy to knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Selbig

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small light for use on our desk and this streamlined light is perfect. I don’t see us needing or using all the different lighting modes, but the option is there if we need it. The price was really inexpensive...which makes me wonder about its life expectancy. The only reason I mention that, is the LED doesn’t look like it’s replaceable, so this will be another item destined for the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.T

customer_reviews.title: Love the customizability, just wish it was light-switch friendly
customer_reviews.text: Love having the different colors of light and the different brightness levels. Tailoring my bedside lamp to my particular mood of the moment is a modern luxury. The only downside is it is not light-switch friendly, meaning that if you connect it to a light-switch outlet, then turn on the light switch, it will not automatically turn on. It will just be ready for you to press its own power button. This also means if you turn off the light switch, when you turn it back on your settings (brightness/color) will be reset. That's the only thing keeping me from five starring this.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Tips over if you adjust it, which is the entire point of this light.
customer_reviews.text: Not super impressed by quality. Feels kind of cheap. It tips over very easily and is not super adjustable for that reason unless you want to worry about it falling and breaking. I will be struggling to make this fit on my desk with my PC because I cannot adjust it. A weight does not work on the base because of the touchscreen. I do not recommend this lamp unfortunately. It works okay, but there are better alternatives out there. The touchscreen and light settings are great. If you want a basic temperature-changing light and won't need to adjust the neck or move it a lot, this is fine. Not worth the $22.99 though.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough to use for work/reading.
customer_reviews.text: Does not emit enough light to use for reading...”mood” lighting at best and then if I were in need of mood lighting I wouldn’t purchase a desk lamp, but something more “artistic.” Sadly, I missed the window to return due to a family medical crisis so now I’m stuck with a useless desk lamp. If you are looking for clear bright light to read or do work by - this is not the lamp for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but...
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this lamp except that it needs a more heavily weighted base. If the goose neck isn’t over the base, it falls over. I keep a heavy object on it to solve the problem because I really like the lamp, otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: bookwmn

customer_reviews.title: Don't Underestimate This Lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the price of this lamp, I had fairly low expectations. I had a dark corner of my desk that needed some additional light. It arrived well packaged and the features are more than expected. It is very easy to adjust the brightness which is fairly common. But the ability to adjust the light temperature makes it easy on the eyes. There is nothing cheap about this very cost-effective lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp and well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I had the same desk/nightstand lite for 20 years. Out of the blue, it died one evening. I looked & looked, and after reading multiple positive reviews, I chose this lamp. It far exceeds my expectations. I love it’s versatility and having a port to charge my iPhone, is an extra bonus. It is attractive and doesn’t take up any room.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Light, TaoTronics
customer_reviews.text: I've had the TaoTronics LED desk lamp for about a week or so and find it a great bedroom desk light. It is very responsive to the touch and I really like that it can be dimmed. When I'm reading in the middle of the night as I sometimes do, I can turn it way down and not disturb my wife. I also like the color temperature variations for my different reading situations. The price was great and it works better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Practical
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lamp on my computer desk because the light on the ceiling was behind me and when I was reading my body would cause a shadow that made it more difficult to read. Problem solved. It is cool looking, doesn't take up much room and highly efficient because I can change the brightness and mode to suit my preferences. I'm happy I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo Ramos

customer_reviews.title: A Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for use as a reading light to place in my bookcase headboard on my bed. To my surprise, it was the perfect size for that purpose...and it works great. I love the different lighting levels and types, and also the USB charging port. This little lamp has it all. It is also stylish and seems to be high quality. I was already a fan of TaoTronics because of my car hands-free set, but now I'm totally sold!
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Decent reading lamp, but terrible desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: It's too short to clear a 20" LCD, the light cannot be aimed upward, and the base is too light to position in the light in many useful places without it falling over. The light itself is great, multiple colors and brightness levels to match what is needed. This isn't useful as a desk lamp in my opinion, but does make a decent reading lamp. Oh, and one last thing. The manufacturer would do well to put some sort of tactile feed back over the power button. It's next to impossible to turn this lamp on in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sandling

customer_reviews.title: A good, not too bright, LED lamp. Holding up well since July 2017.
customer_reviews.text: We (spouse & I) use it as a night light on the dimmest setting and a reading in bed light at brighter settings. The base is light and it is not super stable, so we weighed the base with a piece of metal. We like the color temperature options. We have some 12 watt and brighter LED lamps for locations where we need more light for crafts work. For us, the gooseneck is not as versatile models with straight hinged sections such as the TT-DL13B LED Desk Lamp. However, those have not held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy & Sully

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp - know your physical setting
customer_reviews.text: Lot of pluses: solid, touch pad works well, brightness, color changes. Know your physical setting though. A) Only top half of arm is flexible so won't work if you need to bend like a pretzel. B) Lamp head is a little large, I had to work to position so it would light workspace without impinging on view of monitor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wire

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I guess I didn't pay attention to the description when I ordered this desk lamp, but a very nice feature is that you can change the tones of the lighting from bright white to warm, and it has 6 brightness increments. The base is about 6"x almost 4" and stands about 13" tall at the crook where it bends. Hopefully it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J Greene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly right
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk lamp. It has several brightness settings. The light provides flattering light for conference calling. It doesn’t take up too much room on my desk. It is flexible and easily adjusted. I think the quality for the price is outstanding. And it was shipped to me very quickly. Really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Michaels

customer_reviews.title: Stop sticking USB ports on things that don't need them.
customer_reviews.text: Sunvalley Group/TaoTronics used to sell this lamp for $19.99, but then—for unknown reasons—they added a USB port to each of their LED lamp models, and increased the prices $10. Stop paying for extraneous features. Don't buy this lamp—there are 24 others on Amazon just like it (and several of them don't charge an 'ooh shiny' tax).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs different on/off system. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.text: The light part works great. Love the different settings. My problem is with turning it on/off. I have to press that "button" multiple times to get it to do anything. Also, it's super hard to find the on/off in the dark. Would be nicer to have a raised area or an actual switch. This way I have to turn on another light in order to see where to push the on/off button then push it multiple times to get it to do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Kramer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lamp for the price, I especially like the dimming feature, which is very important to me.
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to why most people by lamps, I purchased this based on how DIM it could get. I work part-time in the theater, and need a reliable lamp to read scripts, cues, etc. This fit the bill perfectly! It's bright enough to use during rehearsals, and dim enough to use during performances. There is an added benefit of being able to change the color temperature, so muting it down to the red side, and dimming it all the way provides just the right amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: The PC Maven

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Price
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is bright enough to read by or for other activities such as knitting, needle work, etc. It is easy to adjust the direction of the light, up, down, or sideways. Love the Touch Feature which adjusts the brightness. One of the nicer lamps I have seen for the price. Would definately buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Simply Sue

customer_reviews.title: Mind of it’s own
customer_reviews.text: *Update* Customer service contacted me about being unsatisfied with my purchase and made everything right. I actually loved the light and all the features it had. However it would randomly turn on in the middle of the night. However this company did what they could to make it right. With a refund of the amount the light cost. This is how to keep happy customers. Turns on and off on its own. Not sure why it does this.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson81

customer_reviews.title: WOW! Very cool, excellent lamp - I just purchased a second one
customer_reviews.text: Was skeptical until I tried it out. Very brilliant idea - touch it's on then swipe finger for brightness and touch to change from cool white to warm light. I love it! One on desk - bought #2 for my bedroom as a sort of "fill" light. Usually tricky things like this have drawbacks but I just love this lamp. Well, I love my dogs more.
customer_reviews.author: Verne Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I'm Highly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: this is a cool designed, 21st century lamp. I'm impressed with it's touch diming feature that allows you to control the brightness of the lamp by just sliding your finger against the base. The light can easily be adjusted to your particular desire. I'm also thrilled with it's minimalist footprint, and how the neck can be twisted to whatever position. The lamp is sturdy, and should survive a fall due to it's light weight and plastic frame. This is a must by if you're looking for a nice desk lamp. For the small amount of about $20, it can't be beat! I'm waiting to purchase a few more for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver J. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect on my kitchen desk.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that would light up the dark kitchen desk. This is perfect. I was worried that the base would take up too much space, but it works just great on my desk, and it leaves room for my PC and the bills. Not much extra space after I get all of that but it works for me. It is a great bright cool white light. It has the variable levels, but don't use that much so far. I especially love that the plug/transformer disconnects from the base so I can plug it in under my desk and snake the cord up through the desk grommet and plug it into the light base. No cord clutter.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Hens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I Love this Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp. The color temperature selection is a nice feature. The lamp provides plenty of light as a task light. The dimming feature I use a lot, especially when working at night, where it provides a nice low level ambient light. No flickering observed. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dogbreath

customer_reviews.title: Great LED desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: One of the features of this light that is great is the ease of turning it on or adjusting the brightness. No switch to click. Just put your finger over the small circle on the base of the unit and it's on, run your finger along the lit strip and it adjusts to whatever brightness you want. Lightweight doesn't take up space and is much better than any other lights I've had. Plus, it's LED which is a major plus. Wonderful value for the money. I'd recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Totally love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect desk lamp for working from home and for ambient light when zooming! I needed different qualities of light and brightness for each, and this offers so many options. Cool bright light for working, and warm, less intense light for my Zoom meetings. It's slim (space saving!) and adjustable. I'd recommend this without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: S. Spain

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The lamps work, bought two for my kids who needed desk lamps for their remote school setup. Negative: Both lamps give off a high pitched whine when on. If you can hear high frequency tones and find such annoying then don‘t buy. Also the black high gloss paint show fingerprints and dirt quickly. Since it has no real buttons it wil look messy in no time. Overall a bit high priced for its lightweight plastic construction.
customer_reviews.author: YouKnow

customer_reviews.title: Strange buzzing sound
customer_reviews.text: I love the brightness of this lamp and also the different hues of the light. But, I kept hearing a high pitch noise. I thought I was developing tinnitus and was on the verge of looking up the symptoms and calling the doctor for it. After a week of this high pitch frequency, I finally connected its coming from the lamp. It's highly annoying and I'm sure some people won't be able to tolerate the noise, but I'm too lazy and able to tune things out so I've decided to keep the lamp. Knowing about the noise coming from the lamp, I would have selected a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TaoTronics LED Desk Lamp, TT-DL11 Flexible Gooseneck Table Lamp,5 Color Temperatures with 7 Brightness Levels,USB Charging Port, Memory Function,7W,Official Member of Philips EnabLED Licensing Program
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackTaoTronics - Enhance Your Life Move forward, find your possible, enhance your life with TaoTronics.
We help people discover products that address life’s needs and inspire you to enhance your life. From home goods to gym essentials and audio accessories, move life forward with products designed to match your grit and speed.

Technical Specifications:
Operating Voltage: DC 10V / 0.7A
Power (for LED panel): 7W
Lumens: 386 lm
CCT: 3000K-6500K

What's in the Box: 
1 x TaoTronics Desk Lamp (Model: TT-DL11) 
1 x Power Adapter
1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: Eye-Friendly LED Panel: Enjoy a uniform flicker-free light beam that won't fatigue your eyes even after long hours of use, whether it is for work, studying, or simply reading
5 Lighting Modes and 7 Brightness Levels: Choose between 5 color modes and 7 levels of brightness for a total of 35 possible combos to best suits your activities

Built-in USB port keep your devices getting power when power is needed. Energy-Efficient LED Technology: Achieve the same level of illumination while saving up to 75 precent of energy compared to the traditional incandescent light bulbs
Sleek and Elegant Build: Enjoy a universally beautiful construction that will easily fit in any environment, whether it is at work, in your personal study, or even on the bedside table
Flexible Gooseneck for Extra Usability: Easily adjust the lamp's gooseneck to orient the light beam exactly where it is necessary and get the most lighting throughout the day

specifications.Special Features: Flexible Gooseneck, Modern Design, Touch Control, Memory Function, No Glare Reflects on Screen, 5 Color Temperatures with 7 Brightness Levels, Philips EnabLED Licensing Program
specifications.Usage: Flexible Gooseneck, Modern Design, Touch Control, Memory Function, No Glare Reflects on Screen, 5 Color Temperatures with 7 Brightness Levels, Philips EnabLED Licensing Program
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,798 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
